entry.title: 90"x156" Ivory Large Rosette Rectangular Lamour Satin Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 51.99 - 295.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity:  1 Tablecloth
Material:  Lamour Satin
Color: Ivory
Size: 90" x 156"
Shape: Rectangular
Style: Large Rosette Flower
How to Care: Machine wash with gentle cycle. Hang Dry. Do not bleach.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Rosette Tablecloth

This lovely rosette lamour tablecloth with embossed rose pattern is a perfect embellishment for your table settings. The very sight of this floral ecstasy will bring the divine vision of a paradise garden with its whimsical blossoms and luster into your event/celebration. Leave unforgettable impression for bridal tables, sweetheart tables, and wedding cake tables by spreading these deluxe darlings atop! 

Premium Quality

Rosette tablecloth comprises of beautiful satin roses that pop-out to give an amazingly elegant 3-D effect. This premium quality fabric is made by crafting large satin side by side roses to attain a true fantasy feel and texture. Add a personal touch to your decorations with our floriated overlays.

     

Perfect for Special Celebrations

Add oodles of flair and character in your party with our enticing raised rosette fabric, which is simply breathtaking.  For those special and rare celebrations that need to have an extra doting touch in their ambiance decoration, this top-notch rosette linen is a picture perfect choice. The lustrous texture and hue of these satin roses symbolize glee, feat, and an aspiration to achieve even bigger dreams. Showcase your triumphant jubilancy to the world with this festive piece of art. 



Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Lamour Satin
  • Color: Ivory
  • Size: 90" x 156"
  • Shape: Rectangular
  • Style: Large Rosette Flower
  • Number of Roses: 15
  • Flower Size: 13" Diameter
  • Feature: Lamour Satin Tablecloth crafted into side by side Large Roses
  • How to Care: Machine wash with gentle cycle. Hang Dry. Do not bleach. 
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Rosette tablecloth comprises of beautiful satin roses that pop-out to give an amazingly elegant 3-D effect. Perfect for Special Celebrations

Add oodles of flair and character in your party with our enticing raised rosette fabric, which is simply breathtaking.  For those special and rare celebrations that need to have an extra doting touch in their ambiance decoration, this top-notch rosette linen is a picture perfect choice. The lustrous texture and hue of these satin roses symbolize glee, feat, and an aspiration to achieve even bigger dreams. Showcase your triumphant jubilancy to the world with this festive piece of art.
